name: OR_IMP_IMPLANT
description: The OR_IMP_IMPLANT table contains implantation information for implants that were marked as being implanted for a surgery or invasive procedure .

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the implant information for the implant.

columns.name: IMPLANTED_DATE
columns.description: The date the implant was implanted.

columns.name: IMPLANT_LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log in which the implant was implanted.

columns.name: MANUF_NOTIFY_DATE
columns.description: The date the manufacturer was notified of the implantation of the implant.

columns.name: IMPLANTED_TIME
columns.description: The time when the listed implant was marked as implanted.

columns.name: IMP_STAFF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the physician who implanted the listed implant.
